about_the_game:
The world is a dangerous place and being constantly on the move is the best strategy to survival. However, that doesn't mean that you're completely safe, with enemies constantly trying to bring your escapade to a halt. Take control of your own SVET Scouter-Fighter and clear a path for your mothership, extending your and your friends survival minutes at a time.

Super Vecter Elite Turbo is Vecter, but to the next level. You're a scout pilot sent ahead of the mothership to ensure the area is clean and safe for its passage. You have to hunt down, at insanely high speeds, all the enemies that might get in your way and clear a path for the home that's racing behind you. Every danger that gets through, stops being your problem and becomes the mothership's problem. Your home is cruel however, so if you slow down too much it will ram right through you and you will perish. But don't worry, the mothership has plenty of you at its disposal to send out and clear its path, so just try again! The best scouts get rewarded with the best equipment and upgrades.

Features:
  • Fully customizable ship, both visually and performance - Make each ship your own
  • Expansive and complex skill tree to make every ship feel and behave differently
  • Endless procedurally-generated world
  • Bullet-hell gameplay at insane speeds
  • Rouge-like progression system
  • Multiple save slots, restart as many times as you like
  • No two runs are the same, making every experience unique
  • Sci-fi graphics with high fidelity in mind
  • Built for Steam Deck
detailed_description:
The world is a dangerous place and being constantly on the move is the best strategy to survival. However, that doesn't mean that you're completely safe, with enemies constantly trying to bring your escapade to a halt. Take control of your own SVET Scouter-Fighter and clear a path for your mothership, extending your and your friends survival minutes at a time.

Super Vecter Elite Turbo is Vecter, but to the next level. You're a scout pilot sent ahead of the mothership to ensure the area is clean and safe for its passage. You have to hunt down, at insanely high speeds, all the enemies that might get in your way and clear a path for the home that's racing behind you. Every danger that gets through, stops being your problem and becomes the mothership's problem. Your home is cruel however, so if you slow down too much it will ram right through you and you will perish. But don't worry, the mothership has plenty of you at its disposal to send out and clear its path, so just try again! The best scouts get rewarded with the best equipment and upgrades.

  • Fully customizable ship, both visually and performance - Make each ship your own
  • Expansive and complex skill tree to make every ship feel and behave differently

legal_notice: You are free to use any parts of Super Vecter Elite Turbo (SVET) to create new original audio, video or text media with the requirement that the game is credited by linking back to either the game's webiste or it's steam page. Any use of Vecter material in another videogame is only permitted after seeking consent from the developer (Taranasus). You can seek consent by contacting the developer on their support email address.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS
  • Processor: STEAM DECK | Zen 2 4c/8t, 2.4-3.5GHz
  • Graphics: STEAM DECK | 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.0-1.6GHz
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: STEAM DECK
  • Additional Notes: It's made for Steam Deck, so if your PC is more better you're good 👍

name: Super Vecter Elite Turbo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3750 CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 | AMD Radeon RX Vega 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Two tin cans and a string
  • Additional Notes: It's made for Steam Deck, so if your PC is more better you're good 👍
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: You're the pilot in a scouting ship sent ahead of the mothership to ensure the area is clean and safe for its passage. You have to hunt down, at insane high speeds, all the enemies that might get in your way and clear a path for the home that's racing behind you.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
